website_summaries.verdict: While it doesn't play as loud when it's on battery power, the Sony SRS-X5 holds its own against the top Bluetooth speakers in its size and price class.
pros: For a relatively compact wireless speaker, the simple but classy-looking Sony SRS-X5 offers excellent sound with strong bass
It has built-in speakerphone functionality, a USB charging port (to charge your smartphone), NFC tap-to-pair technology, and eight hours of battery life
cons: Sounds better when plugged in with AC power
its design is more suited for indoor use (speaker isn't ruggedized)

customer_reviews.title: Sony > JBL
customer_reviews.text: I remember a friend having this speaker years ago and loving it. However, I recently purchased a JBL Charge 3 bc it was slightly less expensive than this Sony, waterproof, and I figured with it being a newer model it would be better, however it sounds terrible imo. This old model Sony has way better sound; it’s just so much cleaner and crisper!! I was going return the JBL, however I don’t want to ruin my Sony if I’m out at the river or beach, so I’ll keep it for those occasions, and the Sony for in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Kay K

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, maybe not quite loud enough...
customer_reviews.text: This is an older model, but as such, it is a bit behind... Personally, I would rather save $100 and not have the newest features - I mean, what more do you need than: Pairs with your phone, tablet, computer, plays the music wirelessly, and sounds great! Save the money and buy the old model! Battery life is decent. Only complaint is that the volume doesn't quite reach the level I would like, especially at a crowded party. If you're alone inside, it's more than enough. But if you have a party, it may not permeate the noise enough. But it's well-made, easy to use, sleek looking, and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: evolv

customer_reviews.title: ... I have to be one that gives this a terrible review. Purchased this and was pleased til about ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I have to be one that gives this a terrible review. Purchased this and was pleased til about 5 months after buying it, it stopped taking a charge. So for the price and supposedly being such a quality brand, only getting 5 months of use is unacceptable in my eyes. Also I will add that it was never dropped or even taken out of the house for that matter! No reason for it to just stop working.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Has good control buttons for volume
customer_reviews.text: HOLY COW! This thing makes you do a double take when you hear the volume and quality of sound it will put out. Has good control buttons for volume, bluetooth, etc. The one downside is that it doesn't charge off of usb. That might not be an issue for some, but it disappointed me just a tad. The power brick puts out 12.5V, which I thought was a little odd. But, it's been running for hours now on a single charge, and the music quality is top shelf.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fitzjarrell

customer_reviews.title: ... was bought from Amazon Warehouse deals and I'm extremely pleased. The speaker sounds great and even better when ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was bought from Amazon Warehouse deals and I'm extremely pleased. The speaker sounds great and even better when plugged in. The sound it produces easily fills a medium sized room when plugged in. The size of the speaker is not overly large and can be put off to the side as to not get in the way. After researching multiple speakers and going to Best Buy to listen, I believe this speaker out performed the Bose Soundlink color. I would also say it is better than the mini soundlink however it is definitely larger in size. I would recommend this speaker to anyone looking for a great speaker to fill your family room and impress you with sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brett L.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful full sounding speaker!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker!!! I was hesitant to pay this price for a bluetooth speaker, but after reading the other reviews I went ahead an ordered this. I have not been unhappy that I did. This speaker has the best sound of any bluetooth speaker I have ever heard. I could not believe how good this speaker sounds, and I am still amazed every time I use it. I can't speak highly enough of this product. Yes, it is a little pricey for a bluetooth speaker, but if you are like me and like your music to sound really good, you can't go wrong with this. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: My ears are happy again...
customer_reviews.text: It's very portable and the optional cover is a must if you intend to travel with it. It has a simple attractive stylish design. The sound is comparable to most Bluetooth Wireless speakers on the market. I didn't notice any distortion when playing it loud. It has a clean bass sound and the highs sound nice, too. The controls are nicely placed and no strong illuminating lights striking your eyes during the day or night. It has a USB input for charging another device while you charge the Sony. I'm very satisfied with the Sony wireless speaker. I'm thinking of buying another one in a different color. Thanks Amazon for the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: RUMO

customer_reviews.title: A little bump in your bag
customer_reviews.text: Shopped and read reviews for literally weeks, and glad I did. Exceptional sound, super easy to pair, battery lasts plenty long for our uses. Small and light enough to be portable but heavy enough to have a little thump to it. HF phone is very handy (main use in in studio). Fills a 20X35 hard floored empty room pretty well. Not enough to stage a rave, but great for intended use. Sounds best about a foot from a hard wall backdrop - only downside is sound stage is mono - but you know that going in, so not a detraction. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and reading looking for a Bluetooth speaker and had identified 4 or 5 possibilities. I decided to watch for one of my options to pop upon Amazon's big sale day and this was the first one I was able to buy. What a disappointment. It sounded like the music was coming from under a rock - muffled and small and unpleasant. I sent it back. Today I heard a UE Roll. Amazing sound, fun concept, $99. Don't buy this. Check out UE instead.
customer_reviews.author: Hasles

customer_reviews.title: Sony Made Wonder Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: All the positive review you see for this speaker is true. It is the Bose Killer. Sony did a wonderful job creating this bluetooth speaker. The sound that comes out of this small speaker is just amazing. I use my old Sony Xperia as my muscial jukebox and it sounds wonder. You will swear you're listening to something much bigger. You can't be the price less than a 100 dollar for a speaker that can go to war with any speaker in it's class and win. Also its very portable because it's small and will pretty much fit in any bag for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Abstract Cool Shopper

customer_reviews.title: the battery is super solid and lasts between 10-12 hours depending on use
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an attractive and portable music listening device, look no further. I've had this for a few months now, I bought a refurbished unit, the battery is super solid and lasts between 10-12 hours depending on use. It's clear and so crisp, and it really brings out the bass notes, however, the bass noise is there, but the impact is not. It sounds best, indoors that's where it really shines. There are other units that are much much louder, but here, it's all about quality, not quantity.
customer_reviews.author: jussomguy87

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought refurbished for around $70. At this price it's 5 stars. The "sound" button bothered me after awhile. Too much boom and sizzle. Without it the eq is actually pretty flat and can enjoy for extended periods. Plenty of volume unplugged. Maybe not for a large outdoor party but that's beyond it's purpose. It's a little top heavy...might tip over in the grass but no tipping problems on flat surfaces. I use it on my deck mostly. I don't understand reviews saying it's too big to carry outside. Won't fit in your pocket but c'mon it's a damn stereo. Buy it on sale or take advantage of the crazy cheap refurbished deals and you'll be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: It sounds pretty good and the battery life is great
customer_reviews.text: It sounds pretty good and the battery life is great, it's not very loud though. Inside I think it will do pretty good for most people, outside not so much. I only use it on the deck so I was disappointed with this aspect of it. The sound is full with decent bass, it's not tinny but the treble is off a little. I only have one other wireless Bluetooth speaker and it's worlds better than that but it's an older Logitech so I wouldn't really call it a class peer. That huge battery is very useful for charging phones and stuff with it's USB.
customer_reviews.author: Ineffable

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speaker available
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker, the battery life, bass, and sound quality are unbelievable. I had purchased it as a gift, but I find myself stealing it back all the time! It has 1 touch synch technology for easy connection and has a functional mic for speaker phone function. Only downside is that you can't change songs on it, but I can live with that with the amazing sound quality and price. I did a lot of research before purchasing, and I even tested about 12 similarly sized speakers at stores, I highly recommend this one. It even looks great!
customer_reviews.author: WindowsProfessional

customer_reviews.title: My Best Audiophile Purchase in YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: Truly amazing sound! This is the future of music reproduction - deep bass, crisp clean highs, amazing volume, and NO WIRES! And less than $200. It rocks my cabin! It goes ANYWHERE! I'm so happy! One caveat for Sony to improve - charging time. This speaker requires 4 hours of charging time for up to (but usually less) than 8 hours. This needs improvement. Rapid charge technology or longer battery life would help a lot. But, it's minor - because the sound reproduction is so phenomenal. Buy this speaker!! You will rave also!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. The sound is loud and clear. It's so compact although heavier than it looks for being so small. I don't mind. I like that it charges without having to put the phone on a cradle or dock. This allows me to pick up the phone and navigate the music or apps without having to remove from the charging cradle. It's also convenient that I can share with others who don't have an iPhone since all they need is their own USB wire to use. The speaker phone is adequate, but I don't use it that much so it does not affect me. Overall, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo

customer_reviews.title: Best portable speaker. Beats Bose too!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker. Handles bass and treble so listening to rock/metal then going to hip-hop/rap is easy as pie. Quality sound is crisp and bass isn't overdone or underdone. There is a point though in volume where the treble overtakes the bass but thats only at high volumes. Amazing little speaker! Recommend this over the x7 and bose.
customer_reviews.author: hham5

customer_reviews.title: Sony SRS-X5 a great find !
customer_reviews.text: this is one great speaker.. what a great deal I got ! I am very Happy with this purchase the Seller was fantastic [ got back to me with my questions ! ] very fast... so my review is ... a great [ sounding ] speaker, I give it a 5 star rating ..out of 5 stars ! & the seller was fantastic... it was as described, if you are looking for a nice [ 20 watt by the way ! ] LOUD ...& great Bass sounding portable speaker .. this will be all u will ever need ! A happy Buyer here !
customer_reviews.author: george Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Requires a bit of effort if ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Requires a bit of effort if you are trying to sync with "older" Sony devices--seems primed for Apple products. I ordered it because I have a Sony Vaio E Series (barely two years old) with Sony Imagination Studio software. Bluetooth signal range is limited to one room (i.e., does not penetrate walls well if you are streaming from Pandora, etc.). I am ordering the carrying case as it is too fragile to put in one's carryon luggage without a case. It was what I wanted, and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pensive Placitan

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but annoying power source and volume inconsistencies
customer_reviews.text: Great sound (very clear and decent bass) when plugged in. Much less loud on battery power. No matter the power source, it will clip out the bass or decrease volume for a second when there is bass in a song and the volume is greater than halfway or so. It should have been designed differently. Either don't let the volume go that high at all, or don't clip out the bass. The vague inconsistency of it is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay B.

customer_reviews.title: Auto power off is the killer bug
customer_reviews.text: This has an auto off feature; after 15 minutes of inactivity, it turns itself off. There is no way to disable this feature. Given that this is a simple software issue, why doesn't Sony issue a firmware update? This "feature" basically renders this speaker useless for most applications, especially if you'd like to pair it with an Echo Dot.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo P. Lima

customer_reviews.title: Awesome System and Blue Tooth
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? This system is awesome. My friends had bought the New Bose System Blue Tooth and its great along with a great price, so I did some looking around on Amazon and found this Sony System SRSX5 and I am so happy. As you may know the Bose systems are known for great sound and base. This Sony is nothing to shake a stick at, great sound, great BASE as well. Very happy and for a third of the price of Bose . I will be taking it to my friends home and compare it side by side with there Bose system and show them what I paid for it.. Heeee Heeee
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: The NFC makes it super fast for other people to take over and play ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned mine for 5 months and it is very handy. The NFC makes it super fast for other people to take over and play music and it sounds great. Pros: great build quality, sleek look, NFC, amazing sound quality, pretty loud, phone mic and answer button, holds a charge for around 8-13 hours. Cons: Much louder and lower when plugged in, gloss top scratches relatively easy, too easy to accidently touch one of the touch capacitive buttons, one of my speakers started buzzing after about month 3 of every day use.
customer_reviews.author: Zach G.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing in my opinion. It may even sound clearer/crisper than my car (my car has stock subwoofers ).although it does vibrate quite a bit on heavy/loud bass, but doesn't move itself. This is so easy and convenient to use. I use it ouside by the pool with me, in my room, while washing my car etc. Its design is sleek and simple. (Which I love) .
customer_reviews.author: Cmcastri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Bluetooth speaker after using the X3 and liking it a lot. I wanted to get one that was a little more powerful and had some more bass so I picked up the X5 and I like it a lot. I use it both over Bluetooth (phone, iPad) and using the aux jack for a portable CD player and both are great. I haven't had issues with it losing connection or anything. My only issue is I feel it's a bit heavy to be portable (still have the X3 for that) so it sits on my work table all the time which works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely portable for the house
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this again for use around the house and backyard. It's big enough to produce great sound at low and high volume, but small enough to easily take with you around the house. Pairs instantly with my iPhone 5. Clean simple external design makes it practically invisible. It is a tad heavy and bulky for throwing in the picnic bag, and doesn't feel like it could take much of a drop. I would look elsewhere for an 'on the go' solution, unless you are prepared to handle with care (and maybe acquire the fancy case made for it).
customer_reviews.author: Atticus Finch

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of comparison shopping and ended up buying this model because it offered outstanding sound quality at a very affordable price. I compared it to the Bose Soundlink III and I think this sounds just as good. I also purchased a UE Mini Boom, which I thought sounded pretty poor, and the Denon Envaya Mini, which I think sounds great for the size, but cannot produce the volume that the Sony SRSX5 can. A couple of small cons are 1) the battery life is not great and 2) you only get 20w of power when the unit is plugged in - otherwise it's 8. But overall the sound quality is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: JB2000

customer_reviews.title: and I upsell the crap out of it
customer_reviews.text: I sell this at work now after owning it, and I upsell the crap out of it. A customer came back to tell me how much his little girl loved it for her birthday. I told him about the new X55 I had in my stockroom and he bought it on the spot. Moreover, he's even happier that this outshined the Bose Mini. Imagine how great the X55 is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprising sound, easy setup, solid looks.
customer_reviews.text: Great rich sound. Almost 5 stars. The buttons on top could be a little more tactile - some are physical, like the iPhone's Home button, and some are merely touch. Otherwise, terrific. Holds charge for about 8 hours of continuous play. Can be used while recharging. The metal screens covering the speakers (speakers are mounted on both front and back surfaces) do not appear to be weatherproof, so not a best choice for sketchy weather days outside.
customer_reviews.author: K. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Sony SRSX5 Portable NFC Bluetooth Wireless. This is about the third portable speaker I have tried. It is working well for me, easily the best of the three. I think it sounds good, but my hearing is not good enough to make a good judgement. I can say that it pairs up on bluetooth easily. The plug aux port works well with non-bluetooth devices. Battery life is satisfactory. It is very portable so I use it all over the house (some areas on bluetooth, others not). I have not used the speaker phone capability.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As far as sound its great but personally still enjoy the sound the BOSE puts ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always had SONY products and they always seems to last. As far as sound its great but personally still enjoy the sound the BOSE puts out more. The Sound Button on the SONY seems to take some bass away or just puts out more highs frequency. Other than that I do like pairing it to phone for music or laptop for videos.
customer_reviews.author: Tron

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and the charging has come in handy
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and the charging has come in handy. I listened to videos on Youtube and surprisingly you can tell the difference when compared with similar competitors. After hearing the Bose Soundlink Color in person I appreciated the difference in base the Sony SRSX5 provides. You will enjoy this purchase. The weight is a little bit greater that the Bose so this would be a con if you want to carry it in your purse. The Bose seems a little easier to carry around although either is of no significant size.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Clicks

customer_reviews.title: Infuriating
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker for almost 2 years, but only recently have I really started to use it. I use it primarily to play music from my computer (which is about 6 ft from the speaker). The sound cuts in and out constantly, and it is infuriating. I turn bluetooth on and off and relink the speaker to the computer. It will work for about 15 minutes or so, and then it starts again. If I could go back, I would not buy this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: soobee620

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought the speaker to go with a Echo Dot in the living/dining area. My only disappointment is it needs to be paired every time you use it. I have a Bose in the bedroom and never have to pair. The sound is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Holen

customer_reviews.title: Ya gotta let it charge!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was delivered last night. I plugged it in and linked it to my lap top and it sounded O.K. but not impressive. I was comparing the sound to my $30.00 Oontz Angle and the Oontz was holding it's own when the power level on the Sony came up enough to finally make the bass speaker work ( this took 10-15 minutes after plugging in the charger) Suddenly it had a very rich, full sound and I was enjoying some oldies but goodies. Yes, it's a bit expensive, but I'm worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: It sound great, just don't enter it in a beauty pageant.
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate relationship with Sony. Their products have always been solid, they use good components and every sound product I've used, to my ear, is excellent for the price. Form Factor. Their only failing as I see is its uninspired design. Square, flat. Ho hum. So if you are all about function over form, go for it, the sound is loud and clear. Plenty of bass and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Soylentboy

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! I've been using it for over a year now. My only complaint is sometimes the signal gets weak while streaming music - I haven't figured out if it's my internet connection (I usually get about a 700mbps download speed) or the Bluetooth signal. But I just reboot it and it's all better.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little wireless boombox
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little wireless boombox. Battery lasts a long time and the sound is good. It can get pretty bass-y for being wireless and battery powered, but do take into account that this is not a wall-powered $200+ speaker system with subwoofer. The sound is good but isn't as good as my dekstop PC speakers, but for what it is meant for it is excellent. We use it around the house regularly as our main music box.
customer_reviews.author: dex

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Really good little speaker - for something so small, the bass response is awesome. And the wireless aspect is fantastic - we stream Pandora from our Iphones and then use it for movie viewing from the laptop, all without wires to trip over! Can be used anywhere - the batteries last and last - great job as usual, Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Osbert Ponder

customer_reviews.title: it has beautiful full sound
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this a couple of years ago and when it works, it has beautiful full sound. Now it has stopped working altogether. for 99.00 bucks, I expect more than 2 years service. It also had a tendency to not connect easily with Bluetooth. I would always have to do it for my wife. I am very computer savvy but this was always more of a pain then connecting other blue tube devices.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Quickly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Saw this speaker in target but didnt want to pay full price. I was quickly impressed with the sound on this it fills the room and delivers. I like all kinds of music this is great. The bass is really strong which some people said they dont here much. It has some additional ports and easily connects to my smartphone lg. I loved not having to buy a whole stero the way you used to. I highly recommend this for college students as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C. HTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker, has the volume I need to hear it in my gas golf cart. I've tried other bluetooth speakers but this one does the job, I don't even need full volume. Sound is great for what I use, but have not used as a everyday speaker, so cannot rate the sound quality from a room, but it sure works for me. Plenty of power.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Sony is hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: Accurate clear Sony sound I have become used to. Very high quality build, very sturdy. This speaker is small but nothing to haul around with you all day because it's is a brick. Has 20 peak watts of powerful low end bass, clear treble and mids. Can fill a small room with an impressive sound stage!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Really like the design
customer_reviews.text: First impression after taking this baby out of the box: WOW! Really like the design. There's not much of it but that's exactly why I like it. Also was surprised that it could be used as a power bank to charge your devices on the go. Pros: Could be charged only with an special outlet adapter and I think its not that convenient. Sound is great, loud and clear with decent amount of low frequencies. Also tried as a speakerphone and was satisfied with the call quality. Overall would recommend to buy it. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great, but could be even better
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding speaker. Obviously a lot of engineering went into the production of this little speaker, which begs the question, why not make it a lot better with just a few tweaks. The biggest issue is the charger which is about 1/2 the size of the speaker itself, making it a lot less portable. Something out of the seventies. Also no charge indicator to tell you charge status. Still well worth the purchase if you don't plan to use it for travelling light.
customer_reviews.author: Island Daddy

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is good, but the interface leaves something to be desired
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, but the interface leaves something to be desired. It has a speakerphone/conference call feature, but the people on the other side of the conversation report that it's very hard to understand what's being said (even when we are speaking right next to this speaker). It's a fairly heavy speaker, so you won't be moving it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Trice

customer_reviews.title: The noise levels are pretty quiet compared to some speakers but it sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Works well . It is a simple to use device that can just be control by your phone . The noise levels are pretty quiet compared to some speakers but it sounds good . I'm disappointed it needs to be plugged in to experience the full quality . It's a durable but not element proof speaker . Extremely portable and the usb in back comes in handy .
customer_reviews.author: Hunter L.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Sony for a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with this purchase. Makes my music sound really good. Two family members couldn't believe the sound this box puts out that they have decided to purchase their own. I have been surprised that it still goes strong after 10 hours on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: Watchman

customer_reviews.title: Product failed within the year
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is very disappointing. All of the touch sensitive buttons stopped working out of the blue, which apparently is a frequent probably. Sony support offered no help in solving the problem, and the speaker is now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Arnot

customer_reviews.title: Stop and look for review it's really cool
customer_reviews.text: So I just get it and for price 120 it's just perfect better than Bose Soundlink mini II. Works perfectly with iPad, PC, Windows phone. Touch buttons are ok, thought that they are worse. No lag during playing video from iPad or other devices. Haven't tested yet as speakerphone once I do it I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: iBats

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC speaker. Highly recommened
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding speaker. Easy to pair and it has a surprising whooomph to the Bass. I listen to a lot of Salsa music. Which is heavy on Horns, percussion & Bass. And this speaker replicates the sound with a fidelity unrivaled by any other device I've tested. The sound is clear & crisp. I purchased two of these Sony speakers "used-like new" for my kids for Christmas and saved a bundle. Highly recommend this product and purchase method.
customer_reviews.author: Tampaman

customer_reviews.title: He uses it outside in the porch a lot since it has a loud sound and the music playback is great via bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday/father's day present for my father and he loves it. He uses it outside in the porch a lot since it has a loud sound and the music playback is great via bluetooth. The sound quality is incredible and it's still very portable. I would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless speaker ever. Connects to my phone without problems. I use it in the house as well as outside. The quality of sounds now amazing and even the range is very good. My phone could be in my pocket and I can walk all over the house (1 story) without the connection breaking up.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: This was a purchase for my husband in his "hobby ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase for my husband in his "hobby room" so that he could get rid of the wires, etc for his computer. The small downside was the charging of it, he wanted it in a location more convenient and out of the way. The box has a lot of sound, so placing it close to his sitting area was a bit much, but it does cover the entire room well with sound.
customer_reviews.author: LatiaMont

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe the sound that came out of this little box. When I read other reviews that compared it with a Boze Sound box I was a little skeptical. I don't know how they can get such a rich and full sound with good quality bass out of something so small. I am so glad it has it's own built in battery pack and comes with a wall charger to keep it ready when you're wanting to hear some music by Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: RGhound

customer_reviews.title: Will play itself off the counter!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. I did the research before buying, and it payed off. Sound is great. Not the loudest but great sound and surprising bass. Just be careful were you sit this thing, it will play itself right off the counter!
customer_reviews.author: William james

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I got 3 of these for my grown boys for Christmas. After opening all of the presents, they couldn't wait to pair their phones and try them out. They were totally impressed with the full volume of sound and the clarity. Next, they had to try answering the phone using the speaker. It worked perfectly. They were very impressed and they all started listing the different situations where they could use their speakers, like at their pool or cooking out or taking the dogs to chase sticks at the lake. This speaker was a huge hit and I felt like, after all of the research I did, I had picked a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Guy Josselyn III

customer_reviews.title: Like it for specific purposes
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. The product meets the need for decent quality sound when stereo is not available. I like that it will convert the tinny sounds of cell phones, e-readers and other electronic gadgets to something that isn't offensive to my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use (she gets very frustrated with technology most ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter who has a very tiny apartment and no TV. This serves as her external speaker for her Ipad and Iphone, and she loves it. It's easy to use (she gets very frustrated with technology most of the time) and sounds great. Two thumbs up for this one!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad speaker. Could use a little more "thump". Easy to connect to any phone or tablet via Bluetooth. I use it with my Sansung S5 and Windows 10 laptop all the time. My wife likes to use it out by the pool connected to her LG G4. No problems. Overall I'd say the speaker is good value for the price. Not great, but good.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is amazing. I'm an old rocker from way back
customer_reviews.text: I listen to Pandora every night on this thing. The sound quality is amazing. I'm an old rocker from way back, so I have owned several stereo's. I'm impressed. PS: I made the mistake of propping this on my TV and it vibrated off, falling to the floor from several feet. Still works!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Cutting edge bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: In my opinon, the best bluetooth speaker in it's price range. Compared favorable aganist Bose Soundlink Mini. More portable than Soundlink III. Sound is full and rich and no distortion at high volumn. Controls are user friendly and connection is a snap! Battery life is decent. The design is rather conservative, basically a rectangular speaker box. All is forgiven once it starts pumping out sound. You'll want to pamper it by buying the external cover sold seperatly. If you are looking for a quality Bluetooth speaker for under $200, you will have to look long and hard to beat this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I also love the feature where it broadens the sounds stage and ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat. I bought mine refurbished and have never had any issues with it. It remembers up to 8 devices and that is a big plus for me. In addition, the mids and highs are very clear and shine exceptionally well. I also love the feature where it broadens the sounds stage and really allows you to immerse yourself in the music. I did an in depth review at my utube MetHD with a sound test in case you wanted to have a sample to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: erick metrio

customer_reviews.title: Replaces my big speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this powerful speaker. The sound is crisp, the bass is great and the music can go loud without getting distorted. The sound fills my entire living room, dining room and kitchen. I'm blown away with how good it sounds. I highly recommend this speaker. It is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound Bass to much for me had it fall off shelf sue to much bass lame you can change settings.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I love the sound the only problem I have with it is the bass levels are to high and you can not adjust the bass levels so besides that for the price this is a nice a little speakers system I say spend the money and get a case for it.. (Updated 8-24-15 One con I have found is if you have bass levels to high it will vibration off a Shelf that had in bathroom awhile shaving.
customer_reviews.author: lakelandguy

customer_reviews.title: Good Bluetooth Wireless Speaker from SONY!
customer_reviews.text: The SONY Bluetooth wireless speaker sounds really good. I can feel the subwoofer moving the air around the box. Both HIGH & LOW frequencies are clear. The unit's outlook is beautiful and feels heavy. It's very easy to pair my Tablet & Cell phone to the system. It's will be perfect, if the unit has a battery level indicator - to show how much the batter is charged.
customer_reviews.author: C. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Snap crackle and POP!!!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a UE boom to this device ao I got to try them side by side. PROS: Good quality sound at lower volumes, looks sleek, touch buttons are really cool CONS: Bass goes away almost completely after about halfway up, still doesn't get as loud as the ue boom and it breaks up/ distorts at max volume. Oh, and the special charger? The charger is bulky and made specifically for the speaker... good luck if it's lost. I returned it and got another boom. No bueno
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. It has very clear sound and gets quite loud but never bounces around or sounds distorted. We use it to play music and as a speaker to go along with our projector when we watch movies. I was contemplating between this and the Bose mini, and I'm glad I went with this one. The battery life is adequate and the size is perfect. It's basically the size and shape of a medium sized 600 page book.
customer_reviews.author: k.dre

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker. I have the bosemini 2 as well. I found the Sony SRSX5 speaker to be a bit louder. So I end up using this one the most. It is bigger in size, but the sound is great. Just make sure to anchor is down if you blast it. It will vibrate its way off the table =p I do wish it had a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Arpeojus

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is wonderful. I didn't expect to be as happy with this purchase given the terrible typical performance of this category. If you want a bluetooth speaker with good sound and fantastic battery life, and looks good to boot, buy this. End of story.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this box for like 3 years and still sounds amazing. Also Sony outdoes it self, Husband ran over the box with his F350 and while its a little bend and scratched it survived and sounds/works just as great as it did when it arrived. Great buy totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Our gift to ourselves this holiday season. Very impressive, compared with others I've seen/heard. Pairs smoothly & quickly, too! Who knew?!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: we where listening to the speaker in bluetooth option and just stoped and the bluetooth led light just stayed bliking like parin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker for a christmas gift so barely three months of use and the Bluetooth source stoped working out of the blue... we where listening to the speaker in bluetooth option and just stoped and the bluetooth led light just stayed bliking like paring but it cant be detected, it stays that way untill it turns off autamatically. I tried the reset button but it stays the same. I would like to get a refund or an item exchange. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Love my Sony SRSX5!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality! My son has a Beats Pill portable speaker. It was more expensive, yet my Sony SRSX5 is so much better. It connects to my iPhone and my iPad2 without any problems. It has great sound quality and good bass. If I had to choose anything negative, I'd say that the speaker is a little heavy and the volume doesn't go as loud as I would like, but it is still great for a small speaker. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: Lacks loudness.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is very nice looking and I like how it feels solid in your hand. I bought it when it was on sale for $129 and at this price I think its okay. I'm not sure that I would buy it at $200 or anything close to that especially because the volume isn't all that great. I was hoping for this to be a loud speaker but its not. **If you want a loud speaker keep on looking. If you want crisp sounding music go ahead and buy it.**
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my new addition.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled at how great the sound is on this speaker. Connecting the Bluetooth was so easy and was playing my movie/music immediately. Had no intentions of spending a lot of money on a speaker but the price is well worth it. Sounds great outdoors and the size is perfect for the center of a table. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mare LaR

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the size! The balance of sound is perfect and not just a ton of bass to make it sound better. I use this speaker everywhere; dorm room, working out, bon fires, etc. It's also a very sleek, simplistic, underestimating design with quality, above expectation sound. I would definitely recommend this item for anyone in the market for a quality Bluetooth speaker at a mirroring price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: better than bose jbl beats ue!
customer_reviews.text: great sound quality! better than bose jbl beats ue! bose are absolutely garbage! sony is one of the greatest quality wireless speakers!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kun Qian

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This speaker stopped working after two years. Really disappointed that it's life was so short. Pairing and other buttons don't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: clh

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for their size
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for their size, can make a small living room full of music. Place next to the wall or something similar to have the sound travel through the walls and amplify the music.
customer_reviews.author: Azavelli

customer_reviews.title: Who'd've thought?!
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously great sound! Excellent audio reproduction and gets PLENTY loud at even half volume. I am surprised at the low end of this speaker, and I've sample countless speakers along this line. Well done Sony, well done!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Way better than BOSE
customer_reviews.text: Did tons of research online and in person testing with different units. We narrowed it down to this and BOSE. In person, it wasn't even close. This gets louder and has a fuller clearer tone throughout all volume levels. Very pleased with this and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I am slightly hard of hearing, and this speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: I am slightly hard of hearing, and this speaker is not quite loud to keep on the shelf in my living room. Luckily it is portable so all I have to do is keep it close by.
customer_reviews.author: happyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound for such a small portable device
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a xmas gift. Excellent sound for such a small portable device. It sounds good when on battery power alone, sounds even better when plugged in. We liked it so much, we have purchased a second as a gift for the father-in-law, who is also very impressed by the Sony SRSX5 sound.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smetzer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound! Purchased this unit 4 months ago primarily ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound! Purchased this unit 4 months ago primarily for remote conferencing business calls and I can' say enough about the quality of the sound. Really comes in clear as if you're right next to the person(s) speaking. Needless to say, when I'm not on calls I use it to listen to music and where the speakers dynamic range are tested. For the price, I find that its money well-spent.
customer_reviews.author: Hanumtasi

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this Bluetooth speaker! Always a fan of Sony so I kinda know it's gonna be good. So easy to set up and connect to my phone! I've put on different type of music to see how it works and it was ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!! Bass is the best!!! I've been looking for something not too expensive (under $100) and good quality and I definitely recommend this one. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CH84

customer_reviews.title: a good thing
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good speaker It stands up to decent amounts of volume and has long battery life I compared to the Bose (5 Star product) and it was almost as good but I saved a lot of money. for use indoors and out it real good
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound in a very lightweight package. The bass is very good and does not distort at high levels. It works very well with my Galaxy S5 over bluetooth. Battery life is very good, I can easily go a whole night with one charge. Only complaint is I wish you could charg it via USB as well.
customer_reviews.author: TopGun4815

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very well for a portable speaker. Better than expected. Only caveat is that it is sometimes hard to switch between devices. When the previous device is still connected to the speaker, you will sometimes need to turn off the bluetooth on that device in order to connect with another one. Don't let that stop you. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques-Olivier

customer_reviews.title: ... another one of these the first one sounded so good. Put the new one on the bathroom counter ...
customer_reviews.text: Just bought another one of these the first one sounded so good. Put the new one on the bathroom counter so I could listen to music when taking a shower and getting ready.
customer_reviews.author: Not Voondabar

customer_reviews.title: No wall pounding base . . .
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior who doesn't like a lot of wall pounding base in a speaker. To me, the base in this unit is at a comfortable level and the sound is crystal clear. I really like being able to move it around the house or take it to work. I'm very pleased and would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Good, but missing feature
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great, love the device. Only three stars because of: 1.) No battery charge status other then empty, loading and full. Bose has spoken level status 2.) uncomfortable re pairing when using with multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Kerstin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Desktop Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up.... Plugged it in, charged battery, connected Iphone through bluetooth settings and was jamming immediately! Excellent sound quality. Overall, I'm completely elated with the SRS-X5.....would highly recommend to anyone looking for small desktop speaker.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good small speaker system. Beautiful sound, very clear, very nice. Speaker phone is great. Better than most car speaker phones. Love the Near Field Communication, works perfectly. All in all a great system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this speaker. It has great sound and is a good size (big enough to make some noise; small enough to carry around from room to room). I am also impressed with the battery life. Usually, I feel like companies exaggerate the battery life but Sony was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. It has all the sound (AND BASS) of a large scale sound system.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker. I did some serious research before purchasing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. I did some serious research before purchasing a bluetooth speaker and finally decided on this one. It has the best reviews on the internet and I am very happy with my purchase. Can't go wrong with a brand like Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: These are great speakers that carry a decent amount of bass and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great speakers that carry a decent amount of bass and quality balance. Adds great sound for watching videos on my laptop and listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best portable speaker I have ever heard
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best portable speaker I have ever heard. I've bought 3 of them in the last two months, for me and relatives. I have no idea how they get that kind of power and bass response out of such a small enclosure. But they do. Yet it's a very balanced sound, not too bass heavy. Nice stereo image. I have yet to run the battery down. Kudos to Sony for an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker... Has that wow I didn't expect that sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is awesome. Puts out great bass and sound. Battery lasts for hours and I have already recommended to people. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: james

product_meta.title: Sony SRSX5 Portable NFC Bluetooth Wireless Speaker System (Black) with Speakerphone
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingLet the music play at home or away with the Sony Portable Bluetooth Speaker, SRSX5/BLK. This high-performance device packs 20W of 2.1-channel sound into a sleek, portable design. The Sony Bluetooth speaker comes with a built-in battery that allows for up to eight hours of playback on a single charge. This makes it an excellent choice for people on the go. It has flexible music streaming connectivity options that let you stream your favorite audio tracks into it from a distance. Best of all, the Bluetooth stereo speaker requires no cordage. A subwoofer and dual passive radiators help to round out sound and keep it booming, while the included USB port will allow you to charge a smart device or other USB-enabled electronics. This Sony Portable Bluetooth Speaker, SRSX5/BLK is convenient and easy to use.
feature_bullets: Powerful stereo sound with 20 watts of power
Subwoofer with dual passive radiators for rich sound (50 Hz to 20 kHz)
Bluetooth audio streaming with AAC and aptX support
USB power port for charging smartphones and tablets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars724 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #2,550 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#19,273 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
